description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=2/3.    The city has been taken by an army of demons! You are its only hope, as all other law enforcing units, even from nearby regions, were neutralized during the attack while you were out of town, attending a disciplinary hearing. Your mission is to go in, vanquish the invading army, punish those responsible for such riot, restore the peace and order in the city... and then return to your hearing.
description.short: The city has been taken by an army of demons! You are its only hope, as all other law enforcing units, even from nearby regions, were neutralized during the attack while you were out of town, attending a disciplinary hearing. Your mission is to go in, vanquish the invading army, punish those responsible for such riot, restore the peace and order in the city... and then return to your hearing.
